product_name: Prism Designs EO Atom Box Kite - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The graceful Prism Designs EO Atom Box Kite offers windy-day smiles thanks to a foldable box-kite design that pops open and takes off in the breeze. "EO" stands for Expandable Object-open the kite and watch it spring into a fun flying shape. 3 intersecting planes pop open ready to fly and give the kite great stability when the line is kept taut. Box kite design allows you to experiment with tumbling tricks by slacking the line. No matter which way it lands, the Atom can relaunch instantly with a tug of the string. Ripstop polyester sails are light yet tough for long-lasting performance; rugged fiberglass frame is light and compact to carry yet durable enough to withstand a hard landing. Includes 200 ft. of line and winder. Closeout.
short_description: The graceful Prism Designs EO Atom Box Kite offers windy-day smiles thanks to a foldable box-kite design that pops open and takes off in the breeze.
